top10.thesis: Strong score from calibrated model + relative strength; confirm intraday price action before entry.
invalidate_if: High IV / wide spreads in options

final.why: Strong score from calibrated model + relative strength; confirm intraday price action before entry.
options_playbook: Prefer liquid weekly expiry; choose ~0.35–0.50 delta call (or slightly ITM).
Entry only on confirmation: (a) gap-up holds above VWAP for 10–15m, OR (b) breakout above first 30m high with volume.
Stop: premium -15% (moderate) OR underlying breaks VWAP/structure; also use time-stop (exit by 2:30pm if no move).
Targets: scale out +20–30%, trail remainder for +40–50% when momentum continues.
Avoid entries if bid-ask spreads are wide or IV is extremely elevated vs recent days.

regime_notes: EOD-based model; confirm with next-day price action before taking options.
